title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes with names like 'a', 'a1', 'b', 'c', 'd', etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes show up prominently in the Open Type dialog, making it difficult to find the desired classes.
EB: The Open Type dialog should not display the obfuscated classes.
SR: The Open Type dialog should only display non-obfuscated classes, making it easier for users to find the desired classes.
